tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_generation_patterns (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type VARCHAR(255),
  waste_quantity FLOAT,
  allocation_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE waste_generation_patterns (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location TEXT,
  waste_type TEXT,
  quantity DOUBLE PRECISION,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE resource_allocation (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_name TEXT,
  resource_type TEXT,
  quantity_available INT,
  usage_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE predictive_models (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name TEXT,
  model_type TEXT,
  evaluation_metric TEXT,
  training_data TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_routes (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name TEXT,
  starting_location TEXT,
  destination_location TEXT,
  distance DOUBLE PRECISION,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE waste_generation_patterns (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 region VARCHAR(50),
 waste_type VARCHAR(50),
 waste_quantity DECIMAL(10,2),
 collection_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE resource_allocation (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 region VARCHAR(50),
 resource_type VARCHAR(50),
 resource_quantity DECIMAL(10,2),
 allocation_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE predictive_models (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 model_name VARCHAR(50),
 model_type VARCHAR(50),
 accuracy DECIMAL(5,2));

CREATE TABLE waste_trend_analysis (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 region VARCHAR(50),
 analysis_date DATE,
 trend_description VARCHAR(255),
 trend_impact VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE resource_utilization (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 region VARCHAR(50),
 utilization_date DATE,
 utilization_percentage DECIMAL(5,2),
 resource_status VARCHAR(50));
